column3: restored the `zmq::*` one because it was working and needed

> restored the `zmq::*` one because it was working and needed

Some related discussions:
- https://github.com/zeromq/libzmq/issues/3919
- https://github.com/zeromq/libzmq/pull/3929

From the [log](https://cirrus-ci.com/task/6451153988747264) it seems [possible](https://cirrus-ci.com/task/4859731703496704) to replace `race:zmq::*` with
```
race:zmq::encoder_base_t
race:zmq::ypipe_

> And one more question: if race:zmq::* does almost all zmq-related job, what is the reason to have race:libzmq?\n\nMaybe it was needed when we still used the `libzmq3-dev` apt package, and not depends?

Looking at the [log](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/20618#issue-761612410), I'd suggest to be more specific:
```suggestion
race:CZMQAbstractPublishNotifier::SendZmqMessage
```
